data.title: Murata Manufacturing Revenue 2013-2023 | MRAAY
data.meta_description:
Murata Manufacturing annual/quarterly revenue history and growth rate from 2013 to 2023. Revenue can be defined as the amount of money a company receives from its customers in exchange for the sales of goods or services. Revenue is the top line item on an income statement from which all costs and expenses are subtracted to arrive at net income.
  • Murata Manufacturing revenue for the quarter ending December 31, 2023 was $2.988B, a 0.44% increase year-over-year.
  • Murata Manufacturing revenue for the twelve months ending December 31, 2023 was $11.390B, a 7.12% decline year-over-year.
  • Murata Manufacturing annual revenue for 2024 was $11.317B, a 9.33% decline from 2023.
  • Murata Manufacturing annual revenue for 2023 was $12.482B, a 15.98% decline from 2022.
  • Murata Manufacturing annual revenue for 2022 was $14.857B, a 1.16% increase from 2021.
